content: **finished measurements** width 56 depth 28 **materials** universal yarn major 100% acrylic 200g/328 yds 111 jewel 2 balls hook us size k-10½ 6 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle **gauge** row 1-4 = 4 high save time check your gauge **pattern notes** this half-circle shawl is worked from the center out a picot border is added around the entire outer edge of the shawl at the end raveler jonnamartinez made three awesome videos on how to crochet this shawl **part one** https //youtu be/l6v4etie8dg **part two** https //youtu be/rsxhghj8gw0 **part three** https //youtu be/vmq0py8bkmq errata row 26 should read row 26 slip_stitch to center of double cluster beg cluster in same space chain 2 cluster in same space chain 8 single_crochet in next chain-5 space chain 5 2 times single_crochet in next chain-5 space chain 8 double cluster in next double cluster chain 5 single_crochet in next chain-6 space **chain 5** double cluster in next double cluster to last group of single_crochet + chain-5 sps chain 8 single_crochet in next chain-5 space chain 5 2 times single_crochet in next chain-5 space chain 8 double cluster in next double cluster turn 14 double cluster 21 single_crochet also at knit and crochet now 1 1 https //www anniescatalog com/knitandcrochetnow/patterns/detail html pattern_id=271&series=2
